response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 12000}
